meanings.definition: To type on a keyboard again.
meanings.sent1: After making a mistake, she rekeyboarded the correct information.
meanings.sent2: I had to rekeyboard my essay because I accidentally deleted it.
meanings.sent3: The cat rekeyboarded the same letter over and over, thinking it was a fun game.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced across the keys as she rekeyboarded the important document.
meanings.sent5: He rekeyboarded the password until it was ingrained in his memory.

meanings.definition: Having been typed on a keyboard again.
meanings.sent1: The rekeyboarded document looked pristine with its fresh text.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the rekeyboarded section of the report had fewer errors.
meanings.sent3: The rekeyboarded paper felt smoother to the touch than the original.
meanings.sent4: The rekeyboarded keys gleamed under the office lights.
meanings.sent5: The rekeyboarded file was now ready for submission.
